faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about FileSoldier.

items.question: Is FileSoldier free to use?
items.answer: Yes! FileSoldier is completely free for basic use. You can upload files up to 10MB without an account. Sign up for a free account to unlock up to 50MB file sizes and manage your uploads.

items.question: How long are my files stored?
items.answer: Files are stored based on the expiration time you choose during upload. You can set expiration from 1 hour up to 7 days. After expiration, files are automatically and permanently deleted from our servers.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. All files are encrypted using AES-256 encryption directly in your browser before being uploaded. This means your files are encrypted before they ever leave your device, and only someone with the correct password can decrypt them. We never see your unencrypted data.

items.question: Can I password protect my files?
items.answer: Yes, and we highly recommend it! You can set a password during upload. The recipient will need to enter this password to download and decrypt the file. For maximum security, share the password through a different channel than the download link.

items.question: What is a download limit?
items.answer: You can set a maximum number of downloads for each file. Once the limit is reached, the file can no longer be downloaded. This is useful for ensuring your file is only accessed a specific number of times.

items.question: What file types can I upload?
items.answer: You can upload any file type. FileSoldier doesn't restrict file types, but please ensure you have the rights to share any content you upload and that it complies with our terms of service.

items.question: What happens if I forget the password?
items.answer: Due to our zero-knowledge encryption, we cannot recover your password or decrypt your files. If you forget the password, the file is unrecoverable. Please store your passwords safely.

howItWorks.title: How FileSoldier Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, secure file sharing in 4 steps

step1.title: Upload Your File
step1.description: Select any file and optionally set a password, expiry time, and download limit.

step2.title: Browser Encrypts
step2.description: Your file is encrypted with AES-256 directly in your browser. Optional password protection adds an extra layer of security.

step3.title: Secure Storage
step3.description: Only encrypted data reaches our server. We never see your actual file.

step4.title: Secure Download
step4.description: Recipient opens the link, enters password if required, and file decrypts in their browser.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: We never have access to your unencrypted files or passwords. Your data remains private, end-to-end.

myFiles.title: File History

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Mode
zeroKnowledge.description: Your files are encrypted with keys stored only in share links. To download a file, use the original share link you received after upload.
